Home

I'm a web developer able to work full stack, who primarily uses (and loves) Node.js. I also enjoy toying with other programming languages, such as Haskell, C++, Scala, Clojure (if Leiningen wasn't so slow), and many languages that compile to JS (my favorite is LiveScript). I also maintain a blog, full of various ramblings on coding, religion, politics, and whatever else crosses my mind that's worth rambling in a blog post for.

I also enjoy doing a lot of other things, including playing piano, listening to music, and creating it myself. My own creations tend to blend quite a few genres, but even the music I most enjoy to is a bit broad. Some of my favorite artists, in case you're interested:

  • Icon for Hire
  • Skrillex (well...until his latest album)
  • Skillet
  • Nightwish
  • Delain
  • Within Temptation
  • Excision
  • Lindsey Stirling
